nodes.text: The Trade Federation Home Defense Legions, also known as the Neimoidian Home Defense Legions, was a military branch of the Trade Federation under the Confederacy of Independent Systems that defended Federation purse worlds in the Quellor sector during the Clone Wars. The legions fought against the Galactic Republic 2nd Fleet when it blockaded the Quellor sector.

The Trade Federation Home Defense Legions contained Neimoidian guards, battle droids, Vulture droid starfighters, C-9979 landing craft, Multi-Troop Transports, and Armored Assault Tanks. The Neimoidian soldiers were equipped with bronze armor and long blaster rifles. The Trade Federation Home Defense Legions also made use of an enormous fleet of Lucrehulk-class Battleships.

The Trade Federation Home Defense Legions were mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. They were originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, first appearing in the HoloNet News article "CIS Shadowfeed Dispatch 14:10:05 Edition," written by Pablo Hidalgo and published in Star Wars Insider 71 in 2003.
